findings.title: Lack of minRec Enforcement in EigenpieStaking
findings.description: The `depositAsset()` function does not enforce the `minRec` amount specified as an input argument.

findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The `approve()` routine may have idiosyncrasies from current widely-used token contracts that do not strictly follow the ERC-20 specification, leading to a possible race condition.
